name: Shoot N'Void
description:
A Simple shooter game to play! But the shooting might be a bit of a frustration:

  • Shooting is automatic and only happens every 0.7 seconds
    • This can make taking down enemies with a number amount of health tougher to defeat, but it is certainly possible

Enemies from the old games:

  • The rocks: reference from Asteroids
  • The green-guy, red-guy, ?????-guy: reference from Space Invaders
  • Paca! Reference from Pac-Man
  • The walls: reference from Breakout

Note: The Mac version is experimental

Windows version is free here
